content.text:
I'll help you warm up by exploring the codebase structure. Let me start by understanding what we're working with in this CLI quest project.

<tool_code>
<Bash>
ls -la /Users/juliani/repos/cli/cli-quest
</Bash>
</tool_code>

<tool_code>
<Read>
/Users/juliani/repos/cli/cli-quest/package.json
</Read>
</tool_code>

<tool_code>
<Read>
/Users/juliani/repos/cli/cli-quest/README.md
</Read>
</tool_code>

Let me also check if there are any TypeScript or source files in the project:

<tool_code>
<Glob>
/Users/juliani/repos/cli/cli-quest/**/*.ts
</Glob>
</tool_code>

<tool_code>
<Glob>
/Users/juliani/repos/cli/cli-quest/**/*.js
</Glob>
</tool_code>

<tool_code>
<Glob>
/Users/juliani/repos/cli/cli-quest/**/*.json
</Glob>
</tool_code>

Based on my exploration, this appears to be a CLI project. Let me check if there are any executable scripts or main entry points:

<tool_code>
<Glob>
/Users/juliani/repos/cli/cli-quest/index.*
</Glob>
</tool_code>

<tool_code>
<Glob>
/Users/juliani/repos/cli/cli-quest/cli.*
</Glob>
</tool_code>

<tool_code>
<Glob>
/Users/juliani/repos/cli/cli-quest/main.*
</Glob>
</tool_code>

If there are any configuration files that might give us more context about the project structure:

<tool_code>
<Glob>
/Users/juliani/repos/cli/cli-quest/*.config.*
</Glob>
</tool_code>

<tool_code>
<Glob>
/Users/juliani/repos/cli/cli-quest/.*rc*
</Glob>
</tool_code>
